content.detailedDescription: I was driving down washington r. heading east in augusta ga. noticed 10-15 lights expanding and retracting making different formations. these were speeds i ha e never seen before. they moved from the horizon to the sky at very high speeds than they would pause and hover. they flashed and moved. the formation moved like a jellyfish through water or an entire swarm of knots through the air. very amazing! took video on cell phone...Gave my wife slot of anxiety. also reported incident to 911
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving down washington rd. augusta ga and witnessed lights floating like knats in swarm

content.detailedDescription: I have been observing this same ufo now for quite awhile it shows up after the stars come out. i first saw it at about 1;00 am in the morning. i watched it until now which is 6;47 am,as i observed it it kept moving all different directions as it always does. so to keep up with it there is constant readjusting of the scope.This has a very unusual pettern in that it is very erratic in movement while hovering at the same time,it makes no sound and it is very hard to judge its distance.I have also seen another object to the south much smaller in size with the same erratic movements while continuing to hover at the same time.I have never notified the athuarities however i will be making a visit and let them know i am watching the night sky .Will continue to watch the sky as i have been and so you know i did file another report and a woman if i have the name right is margie terry she should know that i am observing this object in the same place as my last report which is as i look out my front room window it would be over camp clark national guard base .......   will be in touch and these sightings will stop as our winter months bring on more cloud cover however i think the objects remain unseen do to this fact....... jeff risher
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufoseen through meade 114az telescope 25mm lens object half pie shape with glowing bright white light

content.detailedDescription: Had just returned home,  my husband was driving so when we got it off the car, i looked right past his head and saw the light hovering of in distance.  it freaked me out so bad, i scared my husband trying to get him to look. while i was trying to get him to look,  it bolted across the treetops as fast as a falling meteor (but it went horizontal with the trees), only to vanish. i looked for it in front of the house to see if maybe i had just lost it that fast or it went faster,  but no more visuals. this is the first time,  i have ever seen anything like this.  if i had to compare its flight to anything,  it would be a meteor but maybe faster. i even got online to see if anyone else saw it. please let me know if possible.
content.summary: 1st sight hovering for just a few seconds  @ approx. 310° se, then straight path like an arrow to approx. 30° sw vanishing

content.detailedDescription: Red and orange flashing lights.
content.summary: My daughter told me her and her friend saw a flashing red orange ball flying erratically in the sky and hovered and shot off.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 18th around 11 pm on the highway 283 near mt. joy i was heading towards harrisburg watching an object directly in front of me in the sky about 50 degrees above the horizon that i thought was a plane, but i thought something was weird about it because instead of blinking the lights were dimming then getting brighter over the course of a few seconds, then suddenly it disappeared and reappeared in the same area of sky but it had moved at least 50-100 miles through the sky in less than a second, there were no other planes in sight when this occurred. i lost sight of the object because of my orientation on the highway at the time and when i had a clear view of the sky it was no longer there. 

i had just dropped a friend off in mt. joy and she had pointed out the object and said "look that's a ufo, those aren't normal plane lights." she has a tendency to think planes are ufos so i blew it off at first until i was alone and watched the object teleport in front of me through the sky.

i've seen ufo phenomenon before but nothing compelling enough to make me file mufon report until now.

when i witnessed the object teleport i changed my radio to a station that was receiving only static at the time and there was some sort of weird interference occurring until i lost sight of the object. 

i feel it is worth mentioning that throughout my life i've had several extremely vivid dreams of large objects moving over me through the sky, these dreams felt like memories that had been erased because i could smell and feel the air  around me which is completely unusual for all of my dreams. i've had one out of body meditative experience where i feel i made brief contact with an entity of higher intelligence. 

at this point in my life what i have witnessed has removed much of my skepticism, i still view every encounter i have through the scope of science and logic to try to find an explanation other than extraterrestrials but i am at the point where i feel i have many unanswered questions regarding these experiences and this is why i have chosen to file a mufon report, i hope my report might turn up some answers to these questions...
content.summary: A pulsating light i thought was a plane moved from one spot of the sky to 100-50 miles away in less than a second

content.detailedDescription: Was outside and saw movement in the sky next to a nearby plane. observed about 10-15 star-like lights moving in a diagonal line across my view of the sky at the time. they disappeared behind a nearby house so i only got a quick glimpse of them. they appeared to he a little higher in altitude than the plane. it was at appx 8:50 pm on 10-17-15 over what seemed to be a town over (cary, il) they were high enough to see from my location a couple miles away. almost looked like a meteor shower at first but they left no trails and didnt break up. they moved in unison as if in a flock. all equally distant from each other and i believe they were in 2 rows.
content.summary: Saw about 10-15 star-like objects descending in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed when my mother-in-law asked me to come look at something. my wife and i got up and went into the backyard. there i had witnessed about a single light heading west from behind the trees. i followed the light till it got behind the next set of trees on the other side of the yard. by the time i looked back in the direction it came from there was another one coming. i was thinking cool a group of military jets heading somewhere. but once of i thought about it there wasn't any sound. jet crickets and toads. i am a military plane fan so i know what they sound like. i've been to plenty of airshows and i also live by the 180th nag base in toledo. she asked me what they where and i had no answer for her. all 3 of us shot ideals around but couldn't coming up with a logical conclusion.They where these red like balls of light that moved at a pretty good speed but made no noise. lights lasted for a while and there were at least 8 that i saw with my own eyes.
content.summary: Seen a series of lights go from east to west with no sound. at least one shot upward. about 8 to 10 seconds between each light

content.detailedDescription: My other witness and i were walking north, when something caught my eye to my left. the night was clear, and there was a crescent moon in the west. we were surprised to see a group of 5 lights about the size of venus when at its brightest, but not as bright as the planet,seemed somewhat orb-like and they were all of a similar reddish/orange tint. they were all in an irregular spacing, both vertically and horizontally,that is, some were somewhat higher or lower than the others, and some nearer or farther horizontally than the others. they were all travelling in a straight-line course, apparently due south. i would say they were a bit lower than the moon, perhaps 25 or 30 degrees above the horizon. they were all moving at the same speed, and never varied in speed or movement. we noted the time to be 7:25 p.M. cdt. after a couple of minutes,they were mostly lost from view behind trees to the south,then a group of three more similar lights followed, in the exact same way. finally, two more followed, the same as the others, except these two appeared noticeably larger than the others. we thought at first they might be helicopters; but the lights appeared the wrong color and there were no flashing strobes, etc. also, there was absolutely no sound that we could detect. the episode lasted just about 5 minutes, until we lost sight of them behind trees to the southwest. there was no way i could judge the distance nor the size of the lights/objects. their consistent speed and straight line of motion gave the impression that they were moving deliberately, not at random; but i have no idea of what they could have been; just that i've never observed anything quite like them.
content.summary: About 10 orange tinted, starlike lights moving in a southerly direction, low in the western sky, no sound

content.detailedDescription: At night around 9 pm about  3 miles west of jonesville la as i was was driving  west on hyw  84  it was as if a ball park multi lighted object appeared to me from the south about 50 ft over the tree tops then immediately moved medium speed toward the ground behind the trees and disappeared. i stopped on right side of road and listened thinking maybe a plane crash but heard nothing. the lights were brilliant but shed no light at all. night was very dark. i then proceeded west for about 1/2 mi. and saw another light at a 45 degree angle to the south. it was a brilliant  burgundy like color with a perfect stream of smoke  shooting out its top. it. was moving slowly eastward and about 45 degrees downward. it continued this flight for about 300 ft then split in to two parts. one part  continued slowly and methodically in the same direction as before breaking up and the other headed straight down in a slow methodical fashion. slower than gravity would have caused it to fall. the two objects continued in these two directional fashions until they disappeared never seeming to have hit the ground. next day i returned to the area in daylight but could see no signs of any thing crashing in either place. two police officers saw something in the same direction that night but from 5 or so miles  from me and at a different angle.  they described it as being cigar shaped. they radioed around inquiring about a plane crash but none were found.    thanks.   jsf
content.summary: Ball park type multi lighted, 4 or 5 white, greenish lights and a burgundy colored one

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my home taking out the garbage. after placing the bags at the curb i turned to the south west to go into my house when i saw a large object with 3 extremely bright white lights just above the tree line. it startled me because i have not seen anything like it before. there were no colored lights on the object, only white. i watched the object slowly descend at a slight downward angle for about 2 minutes when suddenly the lights were gone. it sent a chill down my spine. like i said i have never seen like this before. after the lights disappeared i immediately went in my house.
content.summary: Large object with extremely bright lights, slight descent then the lights went out suddenly.

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a shooting star (meteor?) south of me while in my back yard. my boyfriend was with me but he missed it. about ten or fifteen minutes later he came over to lay next to me, as he was trying to get comfortable i saw what i thought was a second shooting star but got as far as saying "anoth..." i never finished the word "another" before i saw it go back wards and do this zig zag between two other stars. i can't explain the feeling, i've never in my life seen anything like it and it happened so fast. i told my boyfriend immediately what i had just seen. he told me it was going to be ok and to just calm down, i had no idea there were tears running down my face until i felt how soaked my sweat shirt and face were. it was terrifying yet amazing. anyway, we both laid there in the hammock for, i don't know, maybe 15-20 mins and during that time i tried pointing out to him the stars i saw it happen around. before i know it i see the middle star start doing circles and i freak and he tells me he sees it too. it went up and down, side ways, then in circles. i told him i wanted to go inside, he insisted we watch for a few more mins. i'm going to say it went on for a good five mins. he finally suggested maybe it were a satellite, i agreed but then asked "well, why did the other star zig zag around it minutes before?" suddenly the middle star started jumping. i figured it was my eyes from staring at it for so long so i took my eyes off it for a few seconds at a time and focused on other stars then went back to it, but there it was, still dancing around. 
finally it just stopped and went back to its place. maybe it was a satellite but can those jump from spot to spot side ways quickly and do fast circles? and why the shooting star (meteor?) fly past it then backwards and around it? 
truly freaked out. my boyfriend is being so cool calm and collected about this but he only saw the second half but he's just a calm guy to begin with. i on the other hand feel like i just saw a man walk on water. did anyone else see this? it was north east of bradley beach nj, over the atlantic or from what i could tell.
content.summary: Three stars. two looked like shooting stars, second one went backwards, third star went in circles.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving headed south when i was a redish orange ball appear in they sky, it did not come from anywhere, but just showed up. it rose into the air and sat there for aprox. 45 seconds to a minute. roughly 3 minutes later it reappeared in the sky and shot upwards, and stopped again. shortly there after another one appeared below the first one. the lower one shot to the left, and then to the right, both subsequently disappeared.
content.summary: Redish orange ball appeared in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work in erlanger ky. i was traveling east on i 275. i first noticed the lights as i was approaching a railroad bridge that spans the highway. at first i thought they were strange lights on a train . as i looked closer i realized they were to high and random to be on a train. i slowed down to get a better look and realized i was seeing multiple ufos. i took the nearest exit which was dixie hwy. i pulled off on the nearest street which was winding way. i exited my car so i could get a better look. there had to have been over a dozen glowing orange orbs that flew directly over me. they weren't in any particular formation. it was hard to actually see a shape. they were traveling from the north heading south. they were orange to an orangish red and seemed to pulse. there were no red or green blinking lights no wings and no noise. i work close to cvg and see planes and helicopters on a daily basis. there were no clouds and no trees obstructing my view as they passed overhead. i have never seen anything like this in person and was excited and dumbfounded at the same time. i managed to get my i phone and take a few pictures and 2 short videos. they aren't the best quality because i was so excited and nervous and almost in disbelief . from the time i noticed them on the highway till i watched them pass was around 10 minutes.
content.summary: On  my way from work saw multiple orange orbs flying over the highway.

content.detailedDescription: I work on a horse farm we turnout the first horses at 6:15 every day, i noticed a orb like light bouncing in nw sky super high (not sure exactly), moving incredibly quick and directionally impossible , so taped it briefly b4 it zipped away on a clear sky many stars visible and still fully dark , i had noticed a few planes normal lights flickering (airport north of us) but i thought at first a star possibly then i saw it moving,  ip and down like a heartbeat rhythm, then sideway and off it left quickly up and southerly direction lost it in the stars instantly, it was so much more apparent when i viewed the zoomed in video vs my naked eye although i still thought ufo the video shows more validity and charectistics of a sphere or disk typical ufo fashion, o truely felt i had a paranormal experience but i believe in this my entire life this is my 2nd paranormal experience !
content.summary: I noticed this light bouncing  in the not to high sky nw direction so i taped with my i phone zoomed in,to the naked eye it was not as  apparent  as the video zoomed was  unbelievable ufo charecter

content.detailedDescription: My friend left my house th night of october 10th and cane back running telling me there was ufos in the sky so i went running down the street with him and in the sky was 5 glowing orange orbs flying when 4 disappeared and one stayed stationary, that's when 5 more popped up from behind the treeline and started flying that way then they all flew in the same direction as the previous 4 and then too also vanished about 5 seconds later 4 more cane from behind the treeline and started flying meanwhile i pulled out my phone and snapped and picture and watched them fly away and disappear like the previous ones we sat around and waited to see more but we had no luck, so we went to look at the picture that's when another occurrence happened, in the picture is a line of lights in the shape of a saucer with one possibly 2 grey human like beings on top of it, we did not see that in the sky but its in the picture with the 4 orange orbs we did witness.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 15 to 20 glowing orbs with a unexplained craft

content.detailedDescription: In the early morning hours of october 15th, aout 3;00 myself and a buddy was substituting another friends paper route in thornville ohio. when we was only about 30 minutes into the route on ridenour road, my friend was observing something out the window. the next thing i know he says 'stop the car' he had a very serious demeanor, so i did. he continued to look out the window without saying anything. i was unable to see anything from the driver seat so at 3;30 in the morning and on a back country road i parked the car and stepped out. it was then i realized what my fiend was looking at. off not too far in the distance, maybe 150 yards out was an oval shaped object with red green and white lights on the bottom of the craft from four points flashing in random order. also on each side of the craft were wings. they were not like wings you would see on a typical plane. they were attached by what looked like to be a metal beam or rod and the wings themselves were u- shaped. the craft was ascending into the sky, neither of us ever saw it on the ground, just from the point of ascension. once it reached it maximum altitude of 250 to 300 fee at the most it began to hover for a few seconds. then it proceeded to move in our direction at a very slow pace. the craft was completley silent. it made no noise or left any traces behind it. when it finally reached the road where we were, it was about 300 feet directly above us. it was about a football field in length and diameter. while both of us stared up in shock and amazement, a 5th center light illuminated purple. both of us were to much in awe to move. the bottom of the craft appeared to be shiny. it then continued its path in the direction it had been going never gaining speed or altitude. it was at this point my friend told me to grab my camera, and i took 2 still shots and 3 short videos. we continued to watch it till it was out of sirte. we then got back in the car and finished the route, in the direction rhe craft had traveled. never seeing it again. it wasnt until morning that we checked our pictures.
content.summary: While susbtituting a paper route for a friend, myself and a buddy observed unidentified object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was playing frisbee around 4:40 p.M. sunday, oct. 11, 2015, at blue jacket park in a large field in orlando. my frisbee buddy said, "what are those?" and i turned around and looked north-northeast toward winter park and saw two white orbs against a cloudless blue sky, perhaps a mile away, maybe 1,000-2,000 feet up and moving slowly in tandem (perhaps 50-100 mph, like a very slow airplane's speed) to the ese. we watched for perhaps 10 minutes till the orbs reached the edge of sight on the ese horizon, probably over orlando's avalon park area at that point, headed in general direction of cape canaveral. my iphone and my friend's iphone were in our cars a few hundred yards away, and we did not get them for fear the orbs would be gone by the time we had the phones.
content.summary: Two white orbs seen flying slowly in tandem se over winter park, then orlando

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was bartending at tucker's kozy korner.
2.  i wasn't initially looking towards the objects.  my back was to them.  felt like someone was behind me... turned and noticed a single object ascending from behind the tower of america's to about 500 feet above the tower.  then multiple objects moved into view, following the first viewed object which also began to move laterally after ascension, and across the city skyline.
2.  fireworks, or a flare.
4.  the objects were clearly circular.  the objects were orange and red, pulsating and fluttering.  there appeared to be a black center to each of them, maybe a slightly darker color of sorts in the centers of the orbs.  witness one object ascend.  change direction, moving east to west.  the objects moved across the sky line, not at all in a strait line.  some were clustered, others traveled alone.  very bright.  very clearly circular in shape.  ups and downs, almost playful in their patterns of travel.
5.  initially uneasy.  i was alone, felt the need to run to the dance floor (outside bar) which is located on the opposite side of the building from where this sighting took place.  upon first sight i knew i needed to grab someone else to confirm my sighting so i ran to the dance floor where i spotted our security person.  called out for him and asked him to follow.  he did.  he then witnessed a mass of these objects with me.  filmed what he could on his phone.  my emotions varied.  but i did sense them initially.  almost as if i knew that something was behind me, with me.
6.  lost sight when each of them reached a certain point in the sky.  they moved westward at incredible speeds.
content.summary: Observed 15-20 orange red orbs moving erratically across and over the sa downtown area before moving away at an extremely high rate of speed.  not flares, planes, drones, helicopters.  i would like to know if anyone else shared this same experience.

content.detailedDescription:
An orange sphere of intense and steady light – 

my wife and i were at cannon beach, oregon, for the weekend.
at 11:25 pm pt, friday, october 2nd 2015, i was looking due west over a row of beachfront motel units. 
i noticed a very bright, steady, orange light out over the ocean. the moon was not in the hemisphere, and there were no noticeable clouds. the day had clear skies. winds were calm.
when i opened the sliding door i noticed that the light was slowly moving towards the east, towards the shore, at an even speed and steady altitude. i would guess it was above a thousand feet.
the light was not a pin-point, but a distinct round shape. i looked for a cowling shadow or surface reflection, but could see none. 

the round light was intense, but not like a searchlight, there was no beam effect. there was no strobe or flutter effect, either. i was able to catch a smartphone video of 56 seconds. the video shows some strobing, but that is mostly due to the auto-focus of the phone trying to maintain focus on a light source in the dark.

at 3 seconds in i zoom to maximum, hence the greater distortion and apparent change in size.
at 31 seconds the light moves behind the row of motel units where we were staying. the jostling is me stepping out onto the patio deck to capture a few more seconds.

i could not tell how fast it was moving since there was no background reference.
from the angle shift (+30 degrees at first sighting, facing west, to +60 degrees south-southeast) and the duration, someone with trigonometric skills could roughly figure out the height and speed.

there was no sound, above the sound of the ocean waves. the engine roar sound on the video seems loud, but to my ear it was a distant rumble of surf. helicopters make a distinctive sound at the beach, whether coast guard or otherwise. this was not the light of a helicopter or conventional plane. there were no other lights, no navigational lights, and no other bright lights in the sky for the next half hour.

earlier in the day, around 5 pm pt, my wife and i had seen two drones flying near haystack rock. they had very small white beacon lights and moved in irregular patterns and changed altitude from time to time.

the video isn’t very good, but it is a few seconds (56 seconds) of 'interesting' light.
content.summary: Intense steady orange sphere moving steady but slow from over ocean to shore in oregon

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the computer at the dinner table garden, facing the wall when i realized it was something to change colors quickly behind me, so i turned back and went closer to the forest (which was happening the wide variation of colors) where was the pool and a car, when i looked with my binoculars to see better almost fainted.
i was seeing a large object like a flying saucer with lights of great intensity always changing, but when i looked around i saw a similar beings with monkeys, but then i realized they were not, and thinking a bit could only be alien .Fui just tell my parents but my parents did not believe, but when i went out there was no longer anything there dentro.Eu could not sleep because i was so scared and worried so i stayed up all night
the next morning told the my cousin and she was soon to the site i said i saw the ufo and unknown beings and found a large circle made on the ground, she believed me, but the strange thing is that the car was there he had magnestismo and bolts were stuck there.
content.summary: The ufo was circular and had lights keep changing.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was at my parent's house for a visit when i got out of my car and turned around to make sure they had checked the mail when i saw the ufo. on the drive to there house from my work i thought i had seen something in the sky but i was driving on a wooded road and could not see well. i first thought the light orbs to be drones as i had seen them at their house before. however, these did not appear the same. several white light orbs would appear and disappear with at least two visible at all times. they would change color from white to red. i felt that i should record the event ans so i pulled out my phone and video recorded the orbs. i then realized that these were not drone when they began to look like white fireworks or sparklers in the sky but made no sound and left no smoke. after appearing like fireworks they briefly disappeared, approximately for ten seconds and reappeared as red orbs. i began to get scared and so i went inside the house. when i returned the lights were gone.
content.summary: White orbs changing color, blinking, and behaving like sparklers

content.detailedDescription: I was with my dad getting a tyre changed on his wagon in the adams hill area of woodgate valley, i got bit bored of waiting for the tyre to be changed so sparked a cigarette and wondered about the curb looking at facebook on my phone,then my attention turned to the sky as a group of ducks flew over head, it was then i noticed a bright white light falling from the sky leaving an odd trail behind kind of like a plane would, but very different it certainly was not a plane also there was no sound at all, then i watched in amazement as it got brighter and fell faster so with my phone in hand i started taking pictures and continued to observe, eventually the white light detached from the trail and became brighter then all of a sudden it dissappeared it was brilliant!!
content.summary: A large ball off light with a plane like trail behind it although i was certain it was not a plan falling from sky then becoming brighter until it detached from the trail and drifted downwards, then completely disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
i was waiting out for the northern lights from 11.30pm -12.30am behind a known museum site. towards 12.10am, i noticed a particular star that was white and bright, took note of it and it suddenly saw it move horizontally across, quite a distance, from the right to the left. it stopped, became red and disappeared.

was baffled by it but didn't think much of it at the time. thought it could have been a plane/planet/shooting star.

walked back at 12.20am from location to city centre, disappointed and cold, from not having seen any northern lights so far. went to the 24hr grocer behind, came out with food at 1 - 1.10am, and walked back towards apartment. 

looked up as i was walking and the northern lights appeared for a good 2-4mins approximately.  northern lights then cleared up, and i stood there, hoping for an encore. i then noticed in the dark clear sky, a silver frisbee like object , approaching from nw of view. it seem to flutter/ swing a little side to side, left to right.

stood there dumbfounded, trying to make out what it was as it got closer and lower. my mind tried deciphering it, was it a remote controlled uav/toy/bird/bat/comet? it had moments where it looked like a rugby ball with hints of orange red and became clearer as it tilted at an angle and descended lower.

it then became apparent that it was a disc shape,with a shadow cast on it, which was a dark black/grey, along with what looked like orange red light/glow coming from the edge of the disc. it was not a glowing ball, but i could see the it was emitting a glow from the edge end of the disc. what amazed me further was i could see some detail on it, what looked like a vertical line and horizontal curve line, resembling a 't' on its side.

it temporarily hovered from the right of my view, then did a swift move that was fast but not too fast, at a constant speed!, to the left. never seen any aircraft/remote controlled uavs/satelites...Nothing that moved like that in my life. it moved left and hovered for a few seconds, moved up sped off upwards and out of my line of sight.

i then stood there, completely blank, trying to make sense of what i saw, and felt stupid for not having taken out my camera.

went back to the apartment, still trying to collect my thoughts of what i just saw, but was confused no less. after half an hour to an hour of calming down, i thought nothing more of my sighting and wanted to see if the northern lights would reappear. i then opened my window to take a look outside, and saw nothing but dark sky. 

however, i suddenly had this urge to look above me, and right above me, from what i can remember seeing, was part of a semi-circle shape, over my apartment's roof, with orange lights and one red light.  i remembered just staring at the red light and suddenly realising that, that what i was looking at, was not part of the apartment's structure.  

upon realising this, i slowly stepped back into my apartment and closed the window shaken with the knowledge that what i saw earlier was much closer to me now. fear suddenly kicked in and i just stayed awake till past 3am. nothing more happened, made some calls to family and then eventually fell asleep.

till today, i'm not sure if all my sightings are interconnected, at least not with the 'star' that i saw in the park.  just know that what i saw outside that parking lot right outside my apartment, and above my apartment window were the same thing.  and now i'm totally convinced they're still out there.  believing in their existence is one thing, seeing it is a whole different experience altogether.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc shape ufo with orange-red emitting light seen in downtown rovaniemi,finland at 1.15-1.30am, oct 2, 2015

content.detailedDescription: We were outside the stadium. my grandma  we didn't notice it till later. it looked like a light it wet in a strait view to the sun    my hole family is scared/ creeped out. it just disappeared.   in the photo it is in the top left corner
content.summary: It was light above a military flyover at a foot ball game filmed by several diffrent sources

content.detailedDescription:
It is like a star and they are orderly like a triangle and there were three ufos
walking 
it is in a orderly  manner 
stationery 
stationary
doubt whether a ufo or not ?
came inside the home
content.summary: It is like a star and looking very differently

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from vets office i was gone a total of two hours left with clear skies and a couple of planes had started chemtrails before i went into office by the time i came home i was pissed off that the sky looked so horrible in such a short space of time so i videod it from the front of my property then noticed a nasty colored sun dog from behind the house. i walked through the house onto back deck and snapped off a couple of photos the auto filtration on the phone caught this orb and clearly shows it behind the chemtrail and not a camera caused object. it also moved location in the shots clearly showing a reddish displacement of air.  i was not aware that it was even there until viewing the photos later on.
content.summary: Photos captured orb in sky while photographing sun dog created by chemtrails.

content.detailedDescription: I got into my car 8.30 am on wednesday morning (12/10/15) and looked up at the sun rising from the east, it was still a little misty but to the right of the sun was another really bright object almost like another sun but maybe half the size. i drove of like any other morning but five minutes later when i was facing south again the said object was still there bemused, i continued to drive but still observing when still in view, the object wasn't moving and remained the same. about twenty minutes into my journey whilst i was crossing the kingston bridge in glasgow i held my phone up to take some random pictures thinking it may be my only opportunity, i captured it about 4 times and continued on the last 10 minutes of my journey. i opened my shop at 9 am, told a friend who then went out to find a place to view it, he came back 5 minutes later to say it had disappeared, he then asked if i took any pics which i replied yes. i showed my friend who was also as bemused as myself as to what it could possibly be! the following day i checked the papers & internet to see if there was other sightings, but nothing.
content.summary: Bright unknown object in sky for half an hour.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing out back the house with new camera and spotted object moving fast north to south direction 

did not know what it was

object was moving fast from north to south descending slightly

felt fine

it mover out of sight
content.summary: Outside with new camara seen thing in sky  shot pics wile moving

content.detailedDescription:
Early evening sitting on my patio at 18:40:35 on dec 16, 2013 i notices a small black object hovering in the sky to the north of my back yard.

the object did not move at all. at first i thought it may be a kite but it just hung there and to be honest i now realise that there was no wind on that day.

i grabbed my iphone and took three photos at different magnifications. in two of the photos there is a television antenna on my back neighbours house.

i watched the object for a while and then went back inside. next time i came out it was gone and i didn't see in which direction it went.

i did nothing about these photos but kept them. today, i watched a mocumentary called "the phoenix incident" written and directed by keith arem. in the film, they showed a triangular craft being pursued by an f-15 and it reminded me of my photo. i am a ufology enthusiast and watch hangar 1 all the time.

originally i wrote this off as an anomaly however now i am not so sure. i really don't know what it was but it was weird to just be hovering.

the attached photos are untouched and taken with an iphone 5. would love to know if an enhancement of the photos show anything.
content.summary: Triangular object hovering in sky and did not move while observed.

content.detailedDescription: I wake up most days at this time. my daily routine is to go on my front porch which faces west and smoke a cigarette before getting a cup of coffee. there is a small overhang over the porch. i have a standard chair that i sit in and i put my feet on a guardrail in front of the chairs. when i do that it causes my butt to slide forward and lets me face the sky where i look every morning. it helps me enjoy the coffee and wake slowly. i was almost done with my smoke and was getting ready to get up. don't think this is funny, but when i noticed this thing, i thought it was a flock of geese. (i hadn't had my coffee yet so my brain was a bit slow.) then my logic clicked in and i realized that geese aren't lighted, they wobble and bob around flying, i can't recall ever seeing geese at night, and it was way too fast. the only thing that resembled geese was the shape. it was a perfect geese like v-shape of lights. it was cloudy. the thin clouds like fog and they were low so all i saw were the v-shaped lights moving smoothly. i would say it was moving about the same speed as an airplane would. i just thought it was weird that something would fly in that area, because i live less than a 1/4 mile in the path of an airport, and a usual plane from that airport would fly right into it. i had a thought that they could have it on radar probably. because of the wispy clouds all i could see were the lights. i would guess that it was a triangle, but it would be a guess. i looked online and found a nearly identical image of what i saw. it looked exactly like the picture of the v-shaped lights in yantai, shandong, china. it was just strange that there was no sound at all from it. i stood up and watched it fly in that straight line out of sight. i will have my camera ready from now on. the photo attached isn't one i took, but very close to what i saw. i found this picture online.
content.summary: V-shaped silent flying craft seen through thin clouds
